report.title: Herbal High Experience
report.author: Druid's Fantasy
report.bodytext: Setting: Quiet night in /n These capsules claim to produce an effect similar to that of magic mushrooms. /n /n 10.00pm /n Took one capsule on an empty stomach. Very heavily under the influence of cannabis. /n /n 10.30pm /n Took two more capsules. /n /n 11.00pm /n Nothing had yet happened. Cannabis consumption continued. /n /n 12.00am /n Still no effects. /n /n 12.30am /n Still no effects. Ceased smoking cannabis. /n /n 01.15am /n Ever so slight trailing(*) of lights. /n /n 01.30am /n Sleepiness set in. Think this was due to the cannabis rather than the capsules /n /n (*)Trailing, as I mean it, is in the same sense as if someone waves a glowstick past your face when you're on MDMA. Only this was nowhere near as pronounced as it is on MDMA. /n /n Since that night I tried again with a full dose. I had not been smoking cannabis. They had no effect whatsoever. I do not have sufficient knowledge to propose whether or not there was an interaction between the capsules and the cannabis the first time, or whether cannabis consumption increases/decreases the effects. /n /n I wouldn't bother buying them again, I can get a fresh portion of shrooms for the same price anyway!
